main.name: Jeffrey Su
main.description: Currently a undergraduate student at UC Irvine and currently seeking an full-time job for 2021. You can usually find me coding, eating food, or watching movies!
main.bio: Currently a Computer Science Student at UC Irvine, seeking an full-time job for 2021. Speicalizing in Computer Science and Information at UC Irvine. Familiar with AWS suite (Lambda, DynamoDB, S3, SNS, SQS, CloudFormation, CloudWatch), React, Full Stack Development.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: BS in Computer Science, 2020 HackUCI Best Joke Hack Winner, 2019 HackUCI Educational Hack Winner, Dean's Honor Roll

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Designed and developed a state manager that allows users to track progress of an item within the organization's systems. Built from the ground up with AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, S3, SNS, SQS, CloudWatch, CloudFormation. Increased efficiency by 25% by allowing developers to easily locate products within the various systems.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Worked on a Full Stack application which allowed data scientists to quickly train NLP datasets. Implemented a Job Queue system that allows for multiple jobs to be trained at the same time on multiple GPU machines. Built using ReactJS for front-end, Flask as the backend, MongoDB as the database, and Docker for multi-server support

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Implemented tracking pixels onto ticket selling websites. Helped modify HTML/CSS on websites for a more consistent design. Built a 404 Error Page and Login Page for their websites.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Developed a Full Stack application that enabled global investigators to easily identify money laundering activities between multiple accounts. Built using ReactJS for front-end, Spring Boot as middleware, and Couchbase as the database. Mainly used Semantic UI to build user interface.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Developed rigorous automated testing ruby scripts that were used to test their beta product. Can proficiently use Selenium Cucumber to run web automation programs.

projects.title: Code Climbers
projects.category: A multiplayer game allowing users to pair program common programming problems. Won Best Educational Hack at HackUCI 2019

projects.title: screech.io
projects.category: An io game utilizing sound as control instead of the standard mouse. Won Best Joke Hack at HackUCI 2020
